summary: So y’know there’s an interview where Chris says that he got to keep the shield and the cowl, but he’s trying to get the suit;...
question: So y’know there’s an interview where Chris says that he got to keep the shield and the cowl, but he’s trying to get the suit; imagine if he finally got the suit, and you guys decided to put it to work in the bedroom😏
answer:
Oh my god.

Like you find the suit and weren’t gonna try it on? You were amazed at just how well it fit you body. Looking in the mirror, you grab your phone and snap a few pictures of yourself. Finding the best one and send it to Chris.

He was quick with his response.

From Chris: I’m on my way home now. Can’t wait to see that in person 😘

It took him a while but once he got home, he was greeted with a steamy kiss from you. Your hands messing up his neat hair and tugging on his shirt.

“Fuck, you look so hot in that suit. Got hard just thinking about this on the way here.”

Smiling you pull him into the bedroom and push him back onto the bed. Climbing on top of him, you kiss down his neck and suck on his sensitive skin, making him whimper.

You pull up his shirt and start pressing kisses down his chest. As you did, you undid his belt.

“Do you love me?” You asked him

“You know I do.”

You press a kiss to his hip and unzip his jeans, “Do you want me?”

He bits his lip and whimpers, nodding his head.

You smirk and pull out his hard cock, licking up the shaft. His head falls back on the pillow and groans as you take him into your mouth, “Let me hear you.”

tags: like angela basset would give him no room ckckkdkd
yah i have a lot of thoughts
summary: i listened to a podcast and they asked chris do to a romance/drama with a black female lead, and the female lead should be...
question: i listened to a podcast and they asked chris do to a romance/drama with a black female lead, and the female lead should be angela basset,,,, and he should do it with the beard... is that a concept?????
answer:
HM! now aight lets not jump the gun here. angela basset is a little bit too much woman for him! he would lit rally implode in her powerful presence. BUT! YES to him being in a movie with a black female lead. i think the black women should be the STAR of it bc yeah….and no offense can she not be barely black? like we want dark skin women to be leads! lets get it!

now what type of movie should it be? im tinking a detective noir (bc i can never get enough of those) where they’re trying to solve a murder case and thru that they learn about each other. not fall in love but take romantic interest? the ending would be one of them asking the other out for a cup of coffee. kinda like seven but vaguely romantic and…a man and a woman.

second option is a really tender romance movie. like its not grand and loud like the notebook or anything like that. but like an indie romantic film that’s quiet and tender. and when i say tender i mean TENDER TENDER. tender like beef stew baby! i wanna watch it then cry about in the shower. tender like a mitski song. im not playing! i wanna cry my eyes out! and i don’t want it to be some bs like “oooh they cant be together bc of their race!!!” im over that type of movie. it should a movie that happens now and should be subtle. i wanna see what he can do.

now black female counterparts for evans? hm. maybe aja noami king? tika sumpter? danai perhaps? lupita? yall can name some more. but yah im on board

tags: kc drabbles your pic request day
summary: He hated these things. Someone was going to ask him a question that was inappropriate and he couldn’t answer. His agent told him...
body:
He hated these things. Someone was going to ask him a question that was inappropriate and he couldn’t answer. His agent told him he doesn’t have to answer these things.

“Sebastian. Have you ever had sex with Chris Evans?”

*Shit fuck shit* his brain screams, “I’m just holding my cup,” He awkwardly sips his coffee. *damn it, idiot! That was one you should have denied.*

Seb’s agent watches from backstage, “Ah, christ!”

blog.description: Welcome to my blog, I post stuff about movies and tv shows and music.. Not a spoiler free blog, So look at your own risk.

summary: I can do this all day!
caption: I can do this all day!

body:
Stop hating!

Guys! I saw an article where Brie Larson was talking about the hate she’s getting😭😢 that’s so sad! I mean, she said how excited and worried she was when she was told about playing Captain Marvel. She said she doesn’t know what she’s doing to get all that hate, I mean, come on guys! Stop hating Brie and stop saying the avengers cast hate her, stop the hate!
